TITULO_SOBRE: The Estudio Celestina is a production company that brings together creative
TEXTO_1_SOBRE: professionals willing to change the world.
TEXTO_2_SOBRE: With a particular interest in socially impactful content, we believe in the potential of art as a means to promote change. Our idea is to carry out projects that inspire people to take care of each other and the environment around them, and for this, it is essential that we view audiovisual media as an effective tool for the critical formation of individuals, collective reflection, and the representation of voices that do not usually resonate.
LCC_TEXTO_1: With the aim of giving voice to the interviewed children, As I See It addresses the topics of Money, Fear, and Girls & Boys Stuff in a cute and odd way.
LCC_TEXTO_2: Directed and animated by Cassandra Reis and produced by Mariana Lopes, "Lé com Cré" was awarded Best Animated Short Film at the Grande Prêmio do Cinema Brasileiro (2019), Best Children's Short Film at Anima Mundi (2018), and Best Animated Short Film at FICI (2018).
LCC_EQUIPE: Crew:</br>Direction, Art Direction and Animation: Cassandra Reis

CEF_TEXTO_1: Duda is an up-and-coming drag queen who performs in small, obscure bars in a large city in a distant future. She is in a romance with Teo, a painter born on one of Saturn's moons. Amidst conversations and kisses, we witness the portrayal of an intimacy built through affection and tenderness; one that fades away in uncomfortable silences and life's misalignments.
CEF_TEXTO_2: Dissolved by the end of the relationship, Duda seeks solace in her childhood friend, Lana, who tells her a story about cephalopods and chelonians, a reflection on vulnerability and confinement. Gradually, Duda finds a way to restore herself.
CEF_EQUIPE_LINE_2: Production: Mariana Lopes and Vic Casé
CEF_EQUIPE_LINE_8: Animation: Isabela de Brito, Jotapê Stanzioni Brasiliense and Marcela Moro
CEF_EQUIPE_LINE_9: Clean up/Color: Beatriz Dutra and Letícia Ayumi I Trindade
CEF_EQUIPE_LINE_10: Motion Design e Finalization: Tica Nami
CAD_TEXTO_1: "Over and out" is a short adult stop-motion animation film that tells the story of a young mother embarking on a journey through 1970s Brazil with her two children: Marta, a lively girl, and Luciano, an introspective boy who believes his father was abducted by Martians.
CAD_TEXTO_2: Just as the children are about to discover the whereabouts of their missing father, the entire family ends up being abducted... but not by Martians.
SER_TEXTO_1: Motion Graphics Animation Services for companies and individuals looking to enhance the representation of their ideas with dynamism. Animation material adapted to your marketing preferences, reflecting your brand identity, and optimized for various platforms and audiences.
